features: INDOOR AND OUTDOOR PLAY : Quality-constructed and safe, our teepee tent includes everything needed to keep your little ones active and engaged. Our set includes , poles, and canvas, inviting a magical place for your kids to play.

QUALITY CONSTRUCTED AND EASY ASSEMBLY: We prioritize the highest quality and safety standards, which is why we’ve constructed our set from the most durable and kid-friendly equipment. Easily assemble your teepee by simply attaching the canvas to the poles, instantly creating an extraordinary place for your little ones to enjoy. Disassemble your tent in a matter of minutes.

ENCOURAGE IMAGINATION : From reading books to acting out playful stories, our teepee tent encourages kids to explore their imaginations while stimulating creativity, coordination, problem solving and engineering skills. Inspire the best PlayVibes for you and your little ones and get innovative with the endless opportunities our set has to offer.

A PERFECT GIFT : Gift your child with the joy of having their own special place to read, relax, and play. With easy transportation and quick assembly, this set is the perfect gift to encourage your little ones to be creative from anywhere. "PILLOW AND BLANKET AND MAT ARE NOT INCLUDED".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good quality . Hard to put together. no bottom . Lights and windows are cute. The pockets are very nice touch to hold books

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the style of this hit. It was easy to put together and directions were included. Structure of the tent is sturdy when assembled. The cover of the material is soft. The included lights work nicely and give a great glow. The tent itself is versatile and can be used to play inside, used as a reading nook, or hide and seek etc.Nice easy sized play tent at a good value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adorable but a pain
reviews.reviewText: Adorable once set up. Getting the rope through the sticks was a disaster. Bigger than expected which was nice but not too sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s tricky when it comes to rope ties. Instructions could have been a lot.
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves it. The star light was also a big hit. She enjoys it, it’s 10 out 10 for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, fun hide away
reviews.reviewText: Kids loved it, easy to put together and store. Cute pockets for books or toys. Lights add a little something extra.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It looks great, cozy even. But this thing consistently falls apart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my toddler
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size for my toddler ! I wouldn’t recommend for older children bc it’s not a lot of space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tee Pee IS BETTER than I could have asked for
reviews.reviewText: Tee Pee / Tent material is better quality than I had hoped for. Tent color is a beautiful white. Tent material had a few wrinkles but they will fall out with time or it can be steamed out. Stars are a cute touch once added. Misconception is no mat/ pad for the bottom of the tent is included. Poles are wood , but they come in pieces and are connected by plastic attachments. For the price , this is the way to go!! VERY easy to put together. The string to tie the poles together is a bit challenging. I added my own touches to make the space more inviting to my daughter. She has ASD and our goal was to make her a quiet / positive space.
Bonito, me llego incompletos pero me hicieron un reembolso, el teepee muy bonito

reviews.reviewTitle: Missing Components: Misleading Ad. No customer service. Disappointing experience all round.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this tent, which was priced above other similiar tents as it listed that it included mattress, pillow and blanket. Other similiar tents without these accessories were half the price but I purchased this one so it was a complete gift for a child. It came without a mattress, without a pillow and without a blanket. Contacted PlayVibe who are claiming no responsibility. Disappointed. Ripped off. Definitely not worth it.
